about.details:
Incorporated in 2004, Kolkata based Iris Clothing Limited is a company engaged in the business of Manufacturing, Designing, Branding and Selling of Kids Wear. The company sells its products under the brand name DoReMe in India.

The company makes different kinds of products for kids wear including Tops, T?shirts, Pants, Dresses, Shorts, Frocks, and Towels etc.

Iris Clothing has an active distribution network of over 60 distributors across cities with reach to more than 4,000+ retailers.

The total revenue of the company ( as restated) for the year 2018, 2017 and 2016 were Rs. 5,310.12 lakhs, Rs. 4,689.14 and Rs. 3,699.20 respectively.

The restated PAT for the year 2018, 2017 and 2016 were Rs. 337.09 lakhs, Rs. 159.73 lakhs and Rs. 64.61 lakhs respectively.

The company has more than 600 employees on its payroll.

faqs.question: What is the Iris Clothings DoReMe IPO?
faqs.answer:
Iris Clothings DoReMe IPO is a SME IPO of 1230400 equity shares of the face value of ₹10 aggregating up to ₹11.07 Crores. The issue is priced at ₹90 per share. The minimum order quantity is 1600.

The IPO opens on October 10, 2018, and closes on October 12, 2018.

Cameo Corporate Services Limited is the registrar for the IPO. The shares are proposed to be listed on NSE SME.

faqs.question: How to apply in Iris Clothings DoReMe IPO through Zerodha?
faqs.answer:
Zerodha customers can apply online in Iris Clothings DoReMe IPO using UPI as a payment gateway. Zerodha customers can apply in Iris Clothings DoReMe IPO by login into Zerodha Console (back office) and submitting an IPO application form.

Steps to apply in Iris Clothings DoReMe IPO through Zerodha

  1. Visit the Zerodha website and login to Console.
  2. Go to Portfolio and click the IPOs link.
  3. Go to the 'Iris Clothings DoReMe IPO' row and click the 'Bid' button.
  4. Enter your UPI ID, Quantity, and Price.
  5. Submit IPO application form.
  6. Visit the UPI App (net banking or BHIM) to approve the mandate.

Visit Zerodha IPO Application Process Review for more detail.

faqs.question: When Iris Clothings DoReMe IPO will open?
faqs.answer: The Iris Clothings DoReMe IPO opens on October 10, 2018 and closes on October 12, 2018.

faqs.question: What is the lot size of Iris Clothings DoReMe IPO?
faqs.answer: Iris Clothings DoReMe IPO lot size is 1600, and the minimum amount required is ₹1,44,000.

faqs.question: How to apply for Iris Clothings DoReMe IPO?
faqs.answer: You can apply in Iris Clothings DoReMe IPO online using either UPI or ASBA as a payment method. ASBA IPO application is available in the net banking of your bank account. UPI IPO application is offered by brokers who don't offer banking services. Read more detail about applying IPO online through Zerodha, Upstox, 5Paisa, Nuvama, HDFC Bank, and SBI Bank.

faqs.question: When is Iris Clothings DoReMe IPO allotment?
faqs.answer: The finalization of Basis of Allotment for Iris Clothings DoReMe IPO will be done on Wednesday, October 17, 2018, and the allotted shares will be credited to your demat account by Friday, October 19, 2018. Check the Iris Clothings DoReMe IPO allotment status.

faqs.question: When is Iris Clothings DoReMe IPO listing date?
faqs.answer: The Iris Clothings DoReMe IPO listing date is on Tuesday, October 23, 2018.
